nodes.text: The Outer Rim Exploratory Mining Corps was a front company used by undercover agents of the Imperial Security Bureau during the Galactic Civil War. Tirsia Lek, under the name of Zekra Fol, used the mining company as an undercover in order to arrest Marus Grayson, an Imperial bureaucrat during the bidding of the Jewel of Yavin on Cloud City on the planet Bespin.
